articles.title: Panacea Biotec share price zooms 16% on agreement to produce 10 crore Sputnik V doses - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Panacea Biotec Ltd has tied up with the Russian Direct Investment Fund to produce 100 million doses a year of the Sputnik V coronavirus vaccine.
articles.content:
Panacea Biotec share price surged over 16 percent intraday on April 6 after the company said it would produce 100 million doses a year of the Russia-made Sputnik V coronavirus vaccine.

articles.title: Byju's IPO: Ed-tech startup plans to go public in 18-24 months, says founder Raveendran - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Byju Raveendran said that going public is a clear option for Byju's considering the company's growth.
articles.content: Byju's is planning to go public before April 2023, co-founder Byju Raveendran said. The ed-tech startup on April 5 acquired Aakash Educational Services Ltd (AESL) to bolster its presence in the test … [+2293 chars]

articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: Swiggy raises $800 million at $5 billion valuation, ready to take on rival Zomato - Times Now
articles.description: The latest fundraise gives Swiggy the much-needed firepower to take on Gurugram-based rival Zomato, which has also raised more than $900 million at a valuation of $5.4 billion in the last two rounds.
articles.content: New Delhi: Online food delivery major Swiggy has raised $800 million (about Rs 5,826 crore) from a set of new investors including Falcon Edge, Goldman Sachs, Amansa Capital, Think Investments, and Ca… [+1989 chars]
